attributes.action: Remove George Galloway & David Ward from Parliament
attributes.additional_details:
George Galloway MP has called for Bradford to be an Israeli free Zone. David Ward MP has called for the whole of the UK to be an Israeli free zone.

This petition is requesting the government discuss removing both these MP's from Parliament

The statements made by these MP's do not differentiate between an Israeli who supports the Israeli government and an Israeli who does not. This can not be allowed in the UK. This is intolerance and the UK is not a country that stands for intolerance
